summary:
PERSONAL SKILLS
- Proactive team-player in multicultural and high-pressure environments
- Expertise in contract management and administrative, IT and office tasks 
- Professional multilingual language competence in English, Dutch and Hungarian in the field of
  translation, linguistic quality assurance, terminology

LANGUAGES
Hungarian (native), English (fluent), Dutch (fluent), German (intermediate), French (basic), Italian (basic)

COMPUTER LITERACY
Microsoft Office, spreadsheet softwares, SDL Trados Studio, SDL Passolo, MemoQ, several CAT-tools, Wordfast, Outlook, Lotus Notes

- Creating copy for new features and products
- Assisting copywriters and stakeholders with tooling and processes
- Streamlining procedures for more efficient localization purposes', 'title': 'Copy Specialist', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Amsterdam', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Booking.com', 'description': '- Main tasks: translating English language source texts into Hungarian, checking translation quality of freelance translators, ensuring linguistic quality of company website & applications', 'title': 'Hungarian Language Specialist', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 1816, 'name': 'European Parliament', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFY-t6U0s3uAg/company-logo_400_400/0/1669641425023?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=UCchL64iNA9aYhQtadwhsDK1QbJE4Y171F2_X93gn0E', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/european-parliament/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Luxemburg', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'European Parliament', 'description': '- Main tasks: coordinating IATE and providing translators with different terminology, identifying new terminology items and providing related glossaries and definitions for legislative procedures

- Skills & Job profile: trainee involved in the management of IATE database, terminology project coordination, collecting glossaries and other resources, external contacts organization and miscellaneous terminology-related activities', 'title': 'Terminology Coordinator', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 13299, 'name': 'TransPerfect', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQGjAYf8CSLV2Q/company-logo_400_400/0/1638370935665?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=Ah3mSAGUciwfVVLr59iXzeOL4bCSVusx0EOGDnsXgT8', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/transperfect/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Prague / Barcelona', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'TransPerfect', 'description': "- Main tasks: ensuring the linguistic quality and grammaticality of Hungarian translations (English/Dutch source) and controlling spelling/layout correction, forward and back translations from English/Dutch, providing proofreading and final eye steps in the translation project

- Skills & Job profile: developed teamwork and communication skills, acquired knowledge of the latest Wordfast features, meeting deadlines

- Achievements: completed self-education programs related to the company's quality assurance system, solving problems with translations", 'title': 'Translation Quality Manager', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 1009, 'name': 'IBM', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D560BAQGiz5ecgpCtkA/company-logo_400_400/0/1688684715427?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=u5Re06Myc9BstE2M6qN9MMORKODl8XmTlCBTPMoVtXk', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/ibm/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Budapest', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'IBM', 'description': '- Main tasks: communicating in Dutch with the Netherlands branch of IBM, managing bid requests, calculating pricing cases, ensuring contract quality with regard to linguistic norms and content aspects, following through approval procedures, communicating with bid requesters in English-Dutch, giving presentations and trainings

- Skills & Job profile: meeting deadlines under pressure, prioritizing cases according to the needs of the client, developed teamwork and communication skills

- Achievements: completed self-education programs, reliable team-player solving problems and handling cases effectively', 'title': 'Contract & Bid Manager BeNeLux', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 166488, 'name': 'Transcom', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQF-u0axZtxLTg/company-logo_400_400/0/1639648374187?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=5QfbL0UEHLXZwRpcaU_0O3x5kKegLNc4ouukpjnTAO8', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/transcom/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Budapest', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'company': 'Transcom', 'description': '- Main tasks: processing customer requests, replying to them in a timely and accurate manner, prioritizing cases according to their urgency, processing cases in administrative tools and monitoring incoming requests

- Skills & Job profile: developed time management, logical thinking and interpersonal skills to perform assignments successfully 

- Achievements: achieved customer satisfaction, mastered using soft skills and communicative competence on a daily basis and in a multicultural-multilingual setting', 'title': 'BeNeLux Customer Service Manager', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Dutch Embassy in Hungary', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Budapest', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'company': 'Dutch Embassy in Hungary', 'description': '- Main tasks: assisted in the organization of the Dutch Cultural Festival, translated Dutch language texts into Hungarian, made arrangements with venue personnel, kept track of the guest list for the official reception, kept in touch and corresponding with guests

- Skills & Job profile: developed cross-cultural sensitivity in a Dutch language setting and diplomatic environment

- Achievements: coordinated the Queen’s Day Celebration party as a final event of the Dutch Cultural Festival', 'title': 'Assistant trainee for Dutch Cultural Festival', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Flemish Representation in Budapest', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Budapest', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'company': 'Flemish Representation in Budapest', 'description': '- Main tasks: transcription, translation and subtitling of a Belgian film into Hungarian

- Skills & Job profile: back-office and translation support for the Flemish Cultural Festival in Budapest in translation to Hungarian

- Achievement: the completion of the film which was successfully screened at the Flemish Cultural Festival in Budapest to a live audience', 'title': 'Trainee, Translation manager', 'employment_type': None}]}]
